student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing hobbies with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy playing football. What do you enjoy doing?
I enjoy reading books. What do you enjoy doing on weekends?
I enjoy going to the beach on weekends. How about you?
I enjoy watching movies on weekends. Do you enjoy cooking?
Yes, I enjoy cooking. I enjoy trying new foods. Do you enjoy traveling?
Yes, I enjoy travel. I enjoy seeing new places. What about you?
I enjoy visiting new cities. I also enjoy meeting new people. Do you enjoy learning new languages?
Yes, I enjoy learning new languages. I enjoy practicing English. Do you enjoy listening to music?
Yes, I enjoy listening to music. I enjoy singing along to my favorite songs. It was great chatting with you about our hobbies! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
